definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Trading in Gome’s shares on Hong Kong’s stock exchange was suspended on November 24th.
sentences.chinese: 在港上市的國美股票於十一月二十四日停盤。

sentences.english: Many of those stocks were suspended from trading Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 許多這類公司的股票週二都被停盤。

sentences.english: In Russia, trading on the country's main stock exchanges was halted two days this week because of the turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯，主要的股票市場在混亂當中被停盤兩天。

sentences.english: China has also suspended the Olympic torch relay during the three-day mourning period.
sentences.chinese: 默哀期間，股市停盤，奧運聖火也停止傳遞三天。
